COMMENT_TX: $Managers: Charlie Manuel (Philadelphia NL), Joe Girardi (New York AL); MVP: Brian McCann (Atlanta); first victory for the NL since 1996; no home runs in game for second consecutive year; first time since 1957-58

$Elvis Andrus beat the throw to 2B but Brandon Phillips pretended that the ball went past him; when Andrus got up and started to move to 3B, he realized that Phillips had the ball; Phillips tagged Andrus before he got back on the bag
$the AL had no players left to run for David Ortiz, who went part way to 2B waiting to see if Marlon Byrd would catch the short fly
